definition: variant of 敢做敢當|敢做敢当[gan3 zuo4 gan3 dang1]
to do/to grow/to write or compose/to pretend/to regard as/to feel/writings or works
at or in the very same.../suitable/adequate/fitting/proper/to replace/to regard as/to think/to pawn/(coll.) to fail (a student)
to be/to act as/manage/withstand/when/during/ought/should/match equally/equal/same/obstruct/just at (a time or place)/on the spot/right/just at

sentences.english: Neither God nor your friends will help you, this is your call. You are responsible.
sentences.chinese: 上帝和朋友都幫不了你，敢作敢當。

definition: lit. not even the chickens and dogs are left undisturbed (idiom)/fig. great commotion/pandemonium
lit. small belly, chicken's gut (idiom); narrow-minded/petty
Every family goes through its problems. (idiom)
pinyin: jia1 jia1 you3 ben3 nan2 nian4 de5 jing1

definition: to follow the path to one's own doom (idiom)/to bring about one's own destruction
lit. killing the chicken to warn the monkey (idiom)/fig. to punish an individual as an example to others/pour encourager les autres
A rabbit doesn't eat the grass by its own burrow (idiom); One shouldn't do anything to harm one's neighbors.
pinyin: tu4 zi5 bu4 chi1 wo1 bian1 cao3
